text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Waste Management (Landfill Levy) Regulations 
2015 by increasing the existing Landfill Levy by €10 per tonne from 1st 
September 2023 and also increasing the maximum amount local authorities may 
retain to help defray the costs associated with collection and enforcement of this 
levy.
